title: Braun Styling Range - Ultimate precision for 100% control of your style
description: Braun Styling Range - Ultimate precision for 100% control of your style

asset.title: Braun Styling Range - Ultimate precision for 100% control of your style
asset.author: Braun

transcripts: My beard is a free spirit,  it does it's own thing. My beard is a maturing manly warrior, it's not totally full it's on its way there. My beard changes a lot, I might have a fade I might have a goatee. I like to keep my beard trimmed, organized and precise. I try to let my beard match whatever is going on with my hair that day, when my hair is looking sharp I want my beard looking sharp too.  At the drop of a dime I might want a certain look, it's good to have a styler that has versatility. I like that it's not pulling and tugging, it's easy to use. Easy to use is the most important thing. When my beard is looking fresh on point that's honestly when I feel the most authentic.
